articles.author: NEWS WIRES
articles.title: Major fire breaks out at French plant housing lithium batteries - FRANCE 24 English
articles.description: Some 900 tonnes of lithium batteries were on fire at a battery recycling plant in southern France, authorities said on Sunday, sending a cloud of thick black smoke into the sky above the site.

articles.author: Wes Davis
articles.title: Apple to be fined over $500 million under EU antitrust law - The Verge
articles.description: Regulators in the EU are reportedly preparing to fine Apple over $500 million for anticompetitive behavior following a 5-year-old complaint about Apple Music from Spotify.
